data.event: In 2001 its population was 359, compared to 280 in 1901.
By the 19th century the church was in poor condition and was restored twice, in 1869 and in 1875â€“89.

event.title: mentioned in the Domesday book of 1086

data.event: Within the parish are several former manors mentioned in the Domesday book of 1086: Bradford, Dunsland, Henscott and Lashbrook.
Dunsland was the home of several notable Devon families and the fine house had just been extensively renovated by the National Trust when it was destroyed by fire in 1967.
